sqlQuery.name: AllVariableValues
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct value from (with attributes as (select att.entity_type_id, att.ontology_term_id, v.value from eda.Attribute att, json_table(att.ordered_values , '$[*]' COLUMNS (value PATH '$')) as v where att.data_type = 'string' and lower(trim(v.value)) not in ('yes', 'no') and not regexp_like(v.value, '^[[:digit:]]+$') ) select s.stable_id as study_id, etg.stable_id as entity_type_id, ag.stable_id as variable_id, a.value from eda.Study s, eda.EntityTypeGraph etg, attributes a, eda.Attributegraph ag where a.entity_type_id = etg.entity_type_id and etg.study_id = s.study_id and ag.study_id = s.study_id and ag.ontology_term_id = a.ontology_term_id and (ag.hidden is null or (ag.hidden != '["everywhere"]' and ag.hidden != '["variableTree"]')) )

sqlQuery.name: All
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct value, value as hyperlinkName, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project from (with attributes as (select att.entity_type_id, att.ontology_term_id, v.value from eda.Attribute att, json_table(att.ordered_values , '$[*]' COLUMNS (value PATH '$')) as v where att.data_type = 'string' and v.value not in ('Yes', 'No') and not regexp_like(v.value, '^[[:digit:]]+$') ) select s.stable_id as study_id, etg.stable_id as entity_type_id, ag.stable_id as variable_id, a.value from eda.Study s, eda.EntityTypeGraph etg, attributes a, eda.Attributegraph ag where a.entity_type_id = etg.entity_type_id and etg.study_id = s.study_id and ag.study_id = s.study_id and ag.ontology_term_id = a.ontology_term_id and (ag.hidden is null or (ag.hidden != '["everywhere"]' and ag.hidden != '["variableTree"]')) )

sqlQuery.name: All
sqlQuery.sql: with attributes as (select att.entity_type_id, att.ontology_term_id, v.value from eda.Attribute att, json_table(att.ordered_values , '$[*]' COLUMNS (value PATH '$')) as v where att.data_type = 'string' and v.value not in ('Yes', 'No') and not regexp_like(v.value, '^[[:digit:]]+$') ) select s.stable_id as study_id, etg.stable_id as entity_type_id, ag.stable_id as variable_id, a.value, nvl(etg.display_name, 'n/a') as entity_type, nvl(ag.display_name, 'n/a') as variable_name, nvl(dsp.display_name, 'n/a') as study_name from eda.Study s, eda.EntityTypeGraph etg, attributes a, eda.Attributegraph ag, apidbTuning.StudyIdDatasetId sd, apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dsp where a.entity_type_id = etg.entity_type_id and etg.study_id = s.study_id and ag.study_id = s.study_id and ag.ontology_term_id = a.ontology_term_id and (ag.hidden is null or (ag.hidden != '["everywhere"]' and ag.hidden != '["variableTree"]')) and etg.study_stable_id = sd.study_stable_id and sd.dataset_id = dsp.dataset_presenter_id order by dsp.display_name, etg.display_name, ag.display_name
